title: VENOM: LET THERE BE CARNAGE - Official Trailer 2 (HD)

description:

Tom Hardy returns to the big screen as the lethal protector Venom, one of MARVELâ€™s greatest and most complex characters. Directed by Andy Serkis, the film also stars Michelle Williams, Naomie Harris and Woody Harrelson, in the role of the villain Cletus Kasady/Carnage.
